Hi. My name is Lujia Deng. Thanks for visiting my website. A few notes to help you navigate:


* **ANLY-503 Assignments** consists of visualization-related assignments I submitted for the ANLY-503 course


* **Looking into League of Legends Season 2020** explores the League of Legends Season 2020 data and compares top leagues and teams


* **Cancer & Pollution** is a Tableau visualization project which looks into the relationship between cancer and pollution in the US.
